full_summary:
### 01689-240511 Field Tractor Tender

#### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number (Numero de sollicitation)**: WS4308144649
* **Reference Number (Numero de reference)**: WS4308144649-Doc4320497933
* **Amendment Number (Numero de modification)**: 2
* **Tender Closing Date (Date de clôture de l'appel)**: December 19, 2023 (14:00 EST)
* **Projected Contract Start and End Dates (Dates de début et fin projetées du contrat)**: March 29, 2024 and July 29, 2024, respectively

#### Project Details

* **Equipment Description**: 1 agricultural field tractor with standard technology options and attachments
* **Delivery Location**: Ontario, Canada (excluding National Capital Region)

#### Selection Criteria

* **Bid Evaluation Criteria (Critères d'évaluation des soumissions)**: Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price

#### Notice Type and Method

* **Notice Type (Type d'avis)**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method (Méthode de approvisionnement)**: Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

#### Trade Agreements

* **Free Trade Agreements (Accords de libre-échange qui s'appliquent)**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

#### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity Name (Nom de l'entité contractante)**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address (Adresse de l'entité contractante)**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contact Information (Informations de contact)**:
	+ Name: David Hachez, SPAC/PSPC
	+ Email: david.hachez@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ URL for tender notice: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18081613?extsite=MTgwODE2MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA
